name: Authentication Capture: SIP
author: Patrik Karlsson <patrik@cqure.net>
description:
This module provides a fake SIP service that is designed to
        capture authentication credentials. It captures	challenge and
        response pairs that can be supplied to Cain or JtR for cracking.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SRVPORT
options.description: The local port to listen on.

options.name: SRVHOST
options.description: The local host to listen on.

options.name: JOHNPWFILE
options.description: The prefix to the local filename to store the hashes in JOHN format

options.name: CAINPWFILE
options.description: The local filename to store the hashes in Cain&Abel format

options.name: SRVVERSION
options.description: The server version to report in the greeting response

options.name: REALM
options.description: The SIP realm to which clients authenticate
